fields.Title of Presentation: Relating the Jones and Kauffman bracket skein modules of oriented 3-manifolds
fields.Description/Abstract:
We define and discuss epimorphisms from Jones skein modules onto Kauman bracket skein modules. This is generalizing
Kauffman's normalization of the Kauffman bracket of a planar diagram to get the Jones polynomial. The main ingredient
is the definition of a writhe invariant of framed 1-manifolds in oriented compact 3-manifolds. This is related to work of
Przytycki on the q-analogue of the first homology group.
